page.title: 18DEVILMENT NIGHT
page.content: The 31st of October,Hallow'een, is usually called{devilment night,}for children go around doing devilment -putting sticky mixtures on doors & windows & esp.on the school;and on cars.Air is let out of car tyres;signs are moved around to point the wrong way or are shifted somewhere else, as are 'movable'things such as gates, barrows etc. Sometimes people are tied in their houses. The next morning sometimes people have to clean up or go and find what is missing but if no damage has been done they do not usually mind. Children watch out for patrolling police who want to ensure that no serious damage is done.
